body:
## Summary of the new feature/enhancement

<!-- 
A clear and concise description of what the problem is that the new feature would solve.
Try formulating it in user story style (if applicable):
'As a user I want X so that Y.' with X being the being the action and Y being the value of the action.
-->

Currently when we compress a folder with subfolders and files,
inside the ZIP file the root folder is duplicated.

Here is an example of folder and files structure.

```powershell
+-- PackageName
      +-- Subfolder1
            -- File1
            -- File2
      +-- Subfolder2
            -- File3
            -- File4
```

The "normal" command line would be:
```powershell
Compress-Archive -Path .\PackageName -DestinationPath .\PackageName.zip
```

The problem is that inside the ZIP file named PackageName.zip the root folder PackageName is present.

```powershell
+ PackageName.zip
   +-- PackageName
         +-- Subfolder1
               -- File1
               -- File2
         +-- Subfolder2
               -- File3
               -- File4
```

This is NOT compatible with the .NUPKG format.

## Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

<!-- 
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.
Consider providing an example PowerShell experience with expected result.
-->

Can you please implement a parameter like **-NoRootFolderDuplication**?

```powershell
Compress-Archive -Path .\PackageName -DestinationPath .\PackageName.zip -NoRootFolderDuplication
```

The expected result would be:

```powershell
+ PackageName.zip
   +-- Subfolder1
         -- File1
         -- File2
   +-- Subfolder2
         -- File3
         -- File4
```

This is compatible with the .NUPKG format.

comments.author: w5l
comments.body:
For future reference, this is possible using the following wildcard notation:
```ps
Compress-Archive -Path .\PackageName\* -DestinationPath .\PackageName.zip
```
Note that empty folders seem to be excluded from the resulting archive.

title: Compress-Archive without duplicating the root folder
